mapper.select: SELECT p.web_manager_title, p.web_app_title, p.web_realm_name, p.is_enabled_reg, p.static_version, p.email_reg_template, p.email_resetpassword_template, p.keywords, p.description FROM sys_profile p limit 1
mapper.update: update sys_profile set web_manager_title=#{web_manager_title}, web_app_title=#{web_app_title}, web_realm_name=#{web_realm_name}, is_enabled_reg=#{is_enabled_reg}, static_version=#{static_version}, email_reg_template=#{email_reg_template}, email_resetpassword_template=#{email_resetpassword_template}, keywords=#{keywords}, description=#{description}
